title: #14 Danny's Hallmark/Lifetime Holiday Movie Episode
itunes:title: #14 Danny's Hallmark/Lifetime Holiday Movie Episode
itunes:subtitle: Danny leans into the holiday season this week as he talks all things Christmas, specifically those cozy Hallmark & Lifetime TV movies. Special guest Markus Hill, producer of so many of our favorite Hallmark & Lifetime holiday movies, joins Dann...
description:
Danny leans into the holiday season this week as he talks all things Christmas, specifically those cozy Hallmark & Lifetime TV movies. Special guest Markus Hill, producer of so many of our favorite Hallmark & Lifetime holiday movies, joins Danny to answer all our pressing Lacey Chabert questions, and SO much more. Plus, there's a surprise guest that even Danny didn't know about.  

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
